text: ninnal kamanivrttikkayi purusanmarute atutt cellukayum (prakrtiparamaya) margam langhikkukayum ninnalute sadas'sil vecc nisid'dhavrtti ceyyukayumanea? appeal addehattinre janata marupatiyeannum nalkukayuntayilla; ni satyavanmarute kuttattilanenkil nannalkk allahuvinre siksa ni keantuva enn avar parannatallate
